unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, is a must! Last year's floods near Patna, around 15/07/2023, totally wiped out Ramlal's paddy. Heard he got some relief from PMFBY. Applying on time is key, like before the 31/07 deadline. Heard SBI agriculture loans require it now. Need to check details at the Kisan Kendra. Maybe around 10:00 AM tomorrow. Rs. 5000/acre seems steep though! Good for peace of mind during monsoon from Ashad onwards, I guess!
normalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, is a must! Last year's floods near Patna, around fifteenth july two thousand and twenty three, totally wiped out Ramlal's paddy. Heard he got some relief from P M F B Y. Applying on time is key, like before the thirty first july deadline. Heard S B I agriculture loans require it now. Need to check details at the Kisan Kendra. Maybe around ten A M tomorrow. Rupee five thousand per acre seems steep though! Good for peace of mind during monsoon from Ashad onwards, I guess!
